descriptionHtml:
ATTENTION: The latest version: 1.7Xtream

VERSIONS 1.7  COMING SOON.
Xtream version is recommended ONLY if you play on legendary difficulty

Rachel is a secret daughter of the player, had with a mysterious woman.
Even if the teenage has strong character.
A tenacious and aggressive follower immortal, knows how to use the magic of evocation recovery and destruction, in addition has different abilities such as: twin souls, light foot and many others.
Skilled with bows and crossbows two-handed weapons.
It will be your only follower for all future quests.
You can find rachel in heljarchen hall, she lives there.
Need to have the main room.

Rachel è una figlia segreta del player, avuta con una donna misteriosa.
Anche se adolescente ha il carattere forte.
Una follower aggressiva tenace e immortale, sa usare magie di evocazione recupero e distruzione, in oltre ha diverse abilità come: anime gemelle, piede leggero e molte altre.
Abile con archi balestre e armi a due mani.
Sarà la vostra unica follower per tutte le future quest.
Potete trovare Rachel nel salone heljarchen, lei vive lì.
Dovete avere almeno il salone principale.



                                                                    INSTALL   /    UNINSTALL
 

INSTALL: unzip and merge the Data folder.

UNINSTALL delete the following files:

Delete \"Rachel Teenager\" from the Data folder

The following folders are present in the bug fixer for 1.3, and version 1.4 or higher

Delete the folder \"Rachel Teenager.esp\" location: Data \\ meshes \\ actors \\ character \\ FaceGenData \\ FaceGeom.

Delete the folder \"Rachel Teenager.esp\" location: Data \\ textures \\ actors \\ character \\ FaceGenData \\ FaceTint

SPELLS: Vers. 1.6 
Conjure Dremora Lord, Conjure Flame Atronach, Dread Zombie, Fast Healing, Fireball, Ice Spike, 

INCANTESIMI: Vers. 1.6
Evoca Signore Dei Dremora, Evoca Atronach Della Fiamma, Zombie Terrificante, Cura Rapida, Palle Di Fuoco, Punte Di Ghiaccio.

Xtream vers: Conjure Dremora Lord, Conjure Flame Atronach, Dread Zombie, Fast Healing, Chain Lightning, Icy Spear, Wall Of Flames.

Xtream vers: Evoca Signore Dei Dremora, Evoca Atronach Della Fiamma, Zombie Terrificante, Cura Rapida, Catena Di Fulmini, Lancia Ghiacciata, Muro Di Fiamme.
author: Dovahteam
